content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, you received a command from me to browse the website https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet in response to my question "What are some fun things to do on the internet?"'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text provides multiple lists of fun things to do on the internet, including playing games, exploring digital content, learning new skills, listening to music and podcasts, and more. The article also includes tips on staying safe while enjoying these activities. Links to various websites and resources are provided for entertainment and language learning. Additionally, the text mentions the health benefits of coloring. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet)', 'Guides (https://www.wikihow.com/Guides)', ' (https://www.wikihow.com/Main-Page)', 'RANDOM (https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet)', 'LOG IN (https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet#wh-dialog-login)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://www.wikihow.com/Have-Fun-on-the-Internet"}}}'}]
"""
